question: The Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety is designed to maintain road traffic order, ___________________, and increase the efficiency of traffic flow.

options.a: Ensure vehicles can run at high speed
options.c: Protect the legitimate rights and interests of the citizens

question: A motorized vehicle can run on the road only after it has been registered with the _________________.

options.a: Institution in charge of road transport administration
options.b: Traffic control department of the public security organ
options.c: Department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question: An unregistered motorized vehicle should _________________ if it has to run on the road temporarily.

options.b: Register with the public security organ
options.c: Directly go and run on the road
options.d: Paste a certificate of inspection on the window

question: When applying for motorized vehicle registration, the certificate or document the vehicle owner does not have to present is the ___________________.

options.b: ID card and the certificate of origin of the motorized vehicle
options.c: Certificate of ex-factory inspection or the certificate of import for the motorized vehicle
options.d: Certificate of vehicle purchase tax payment or exemption

question: If _______, a motorized vehicle does not need the relevant registration.

options.b: It is used as a mortgage

question: A motorized vehicle reaching the scrapping standard _________ .

options.a: Is permitted to temporarily run on the road
options.b: Is not allowed to run on the road
options.c: May run on the road after being repaired
options.d: May run on the road after the administrative fee is paid

question: The institution allowed to confiscate and detain motorized vehicle driving licenses is the _____________.

options.a: Department in charge of road transport administration
options.b: Traffic control department of the public security organ
options.c: Department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question: When driving a motorized vehicle on the road, the driver _____________.

options.a: May not bring the driving license with him
options.b: May not bring the vehicle license with him
options.c: Must bring the driving license, the vehicle license and the label of mandatory insurance with him
options.d: Should bring the certificate of ex-factory inspection or the certificate of import with him

question: Before driving a motorized vehicle on the road, the driver should carefully check the __________ of the vehicle.
The motorized vehicle driver __________________.

options.a: May drive at will when there is no traffic signal
options.b: Should drive according to the traffic rules and in a safe and courteous manner
options.c: May drive at will when there is no traffic police
options.d: May drive according to his habit

question: The driver may drive a motorized vehicle __________________.

options.b: When he suffers from a disease that impedes safe driving

question: The traffic control department of the public security organ detains the driving license of a motorized vehicle and ______________ if the driver's accumulated penalty points reach the stipulated limit.

options.a: Educated him on the law and regulations on road traffic safety

question: ___________ of the following are not road traffic signals.
__________ of the following are not road traffic signals.
The illustrated hand signal of the traffic police indicates that the vehicles should _______________.
The illustrated hand signal of the traffic police indicates that the vehicles should _______________.
The illustrated hand signal of the traffic police indicates that the vehicle violating the traffic rules should __________________.
When driving a motorized vehicle, the driver must obey the principle of _______.
On the road not divided into the lane for motorized vehicles, the lane for non-motorized vehicles and the sidewalk, the motorized vehicles should run ___________.

options.a: On both sides of the road
options.b: In the middle of the road

question: When there is a traffic police on the spot to direct traffic, the motorized vehicle should run according to _________.
When running on the road having no traffic signs or markings, the motorized vehicle should ___________________________.

options.c: Stop and look around before going ahead
options.d: Pass if it is safe to do so and the traffic is not obstructed

question: When running on the road having maximum speed limit signs, the motorized vehicle _______________.

options.a: Is not allowed to exceed the marked maximum speed
options.b: Is allowed to exceed the marked maximum speed by 10%
options.c: May run faster than the designed maximum speed of the vehicle
options.d: Should run at the stipulated maximum speed

question: When running in the road section having no speed limit signs, the motorized vehicle _____________.

options.a: Should run at the designed maximum speed of the vehicle
options.b: Is not subject to speed limit
options.c: Should run at a safe speed

question: When running at night or going through a dangerous road section, the motorized vehicle should ________________________.

options.a: Run at the designed maximum speed
options.d: Run faster than the stipulated maximum speed

question: When encountering sand, hail, rain, snow, fog, ice and other weather conditions, the motorized vehicle should run ___________________.

options.b: Faster than the stipulated maximum speed

question: When going through an intersection that has no traffic lights, traffic signs, traffic markings or traffic police, the motorized vehicle should ______________.

options.b: Reduce speed and go through slowly

question: When running through a road section or intersection where lanes are reduced, the motorized vehicle should ___________________.

options.a: Move to another lane and overtake
options.d: Jump to another lane and pass

question: When encountering slow-moving vehicles at an intersection that has no traffic signals, the motorized vehicle should ___________________.

options.a: Move to the right lane and overtake

question: When going through a railway crossing with traffic signals, the motorized vehicle should ______________.

options.c: Speed up as fast as possible
options.d: Pass according to the traffic signals

question: When going through a railway crossing with managerial personnel, the motorized vehicle should _____________.

options.b: Obey the command of the managerial personnel
options.c: Speed up as fast as possible

question: When going safely through a railway crossing without traffic signals, the motorized vehicle should _______________.

options.b: Slow down or stop and look
options.c: Speed up and pass as fast as possible
options.d: Closely follow the vehicle in front

question: When going through a railway crossing without managerial personnel, the motorized vehicle should _________________.

options.b: Closely follow the vehicle in front
options.c: Speed up and pass as fast as possible
options.d: Slow down or stop and look

question: When pedestrians are crossing a crosswalk, the motorized vehicle should _________.

options.d: Speed up in advance and pass

question: When running on a road without traffic signals and encountering pedestrians crossing the road, the motorized vehicle should __________________.

options.a: Honk to urge the pedestrians to go faster
options.c: Reduce speed or stop and yield

question: When a motorized vehicle has a problem on the road and needs to stop and solve it, the driver should immediately open the hazard warning flash lights and _______________.

options.a: Stop on the spot so as to avoid mechanical breakdown
options.b: Move the vehicle to a place where it does not obstruct the traffic
options.c: Stop the vehicle immediately and place a warning sign in front of it
options.d: Stop the vehicle and immediately report to the police

question: When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the road and cannot be moved, the driver should first turn on the hazard warning flash lights and _________________.

options.b: Seek help from the passing vehicles
options.c: Place a warning sign in the coming direction

question: When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the road and cannot be moved, the driver should first of all _______________________.

options.b: Seek help from the passing vehicles
options.d: Keep the hazard warning flash lights on

question: When the police car, fire engine, ambulance and wrecker are executing an emergency task, other vehicles _____________________.

options.a: May speed up and join them

question: When the road maintenance vehicle and the engineering vehicle are on duty, the passing vehicles and people ______________________.

options.d: Should stick to their respective lanes

question: A wrong parking by a motorized vehicle means _______________.

options.a: Should park in the designated place
options.c: Stopping temporarily on the road but not obstructing the passing of other vehicles and pedestrians
options.d: Parking in the lane for non-motorized vehicles

question: The maximum speed indicated by an expressway speed limit sign should be no more than _____________.
When a motorized vehicle breaks down on an expressway, the warning sign should be placed ____________ away in the coming direction.

When causing a road accident involving human casualties, the driver should ____________, and report to the traffic police on duty or the traffic control department of the public security organ as soon as possible.

options.b: Move the vehicle to a safe place rapidly
options.c: Leave the scene and discuss compensation on his own

question: When causing a road accident involving no human casualties, the parties to the accident should __________________ if they have no dispute over the fact and cause.

options.a: Park the vehicles in the original place, preserve the scene and wait for the traffic police to handle
options.b: Immediately leave the scene and discuss compensation on their own
options.d: Preserve the scene and request the insurance company to assess the damage

question: When causing a road accident involving only slight property damage and the basic fact is clear, the parties to the accident ___________________.

options.b: Should report to the police immediately
options.c: Should first leave the scene and then discuss how to solve the problem
options.d: Should park the vehicles in the original place and discuss compensation

question: A motorized vehicle driver who has violated the provisions on road traffic of the law and regulations on road traffic safety is subject to a warning or ______________.
A motorized vehicle driver who drives after drinking alcohol is subject to the temporary detention of the driving license for __________and also a fine of 200 yuan ~ 500 yuan.

A motorized vehicle driver who drives after getting drunk should be restrained by the traffic control department of the public security organ till he sobers up. In addition, the driver is subject to a detention for ________, a temporary detention of his driving license for 3~6 months and a fine of 500 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver violates the provisions on the parking and temporary stopping of motorized vehicles of the law and regulations on road traffic safety, the driver is subject to a fine of __________ if he is not present at the scene and his vehicle obstructs the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians,

If a motorized vehicle driver violates the provisions on the parking and temporary stopping of motorized vehicles of the law and regulations on road traffic safety, the driver is subject to a fine of ________ if the driver is present at the scene but refuses to drive away, and his vehicle obstructs the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians,
If a motorized vehicle on the road has no license plate, the traffic control department of the public security organ should ____________________.

options.b: Impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan
options.c: Impose a fine of more than 2,000 yuan

question: If a motorized vehicle running on the road fails to place a label of inspection, the traffic control department of the public security organ should _______________.
If a motorized vehicle running on the road fails to place the label of insurance, the traffic control department of the public security organ should _____________________.
If a motorized vehicle running on the road fails to bring the vehicle license with it, the traffic control department of the public security organ should __________________.
The motorized vehicle driver who has deliberately covered or stained the license plate is subject to _______ or a fine of 20 yuan ~ 200 yuan.
A motorized vehicle driver who has failed to install the license plate according to stipulations is subject to ____________ or a fine of 20 yuan ~ 200 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered vehicle registration papers or has used the falsified or altered vehicle registration papers, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate these papers, ________ and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the license plate or has used the falsified or altered license plate, the traffic control department of the public security organ should _______, detain the vehicle and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the vehicle license or has used the falsified or altered vehicle license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the vehicle license, ___________ and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the label of inspection or has used the falsified or altered label of inspection, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the label of inspection, ________ and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the label of insurance or has used the falsified or altered label of insurance, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the label of insurance, ________ and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the driving license or has used the falsified or altered driving license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the driving license, ___________ and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver uses the vehicle registration papers, license plate, vehicle license, label of inspection and label of insurance of other vehicles, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate them, ________ and impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has illegally installed siren and marker light, the traffic control department of the public security organ should force him to remove them, confiscate them and impose a fine of ___________.
If a motorized vehicle driver who fails to obtain a driving license drives a motorized vehicle, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____________.

If a motorized vehicle driver drives a motorized vehicle when his driving license is temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____________.

If a motorized driver who fails to obtain a driving license drives a motorized vehicle, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also _____________.

options.a: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
options.d: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question: If a motorized driver whose driving license has been revoked drives a motorized vehicle, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also __________.

options.b: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
options.c: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question: If a motorized vehicle driver drives a motorized vehicle when his driving license is temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ___________.

options.b: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license
options.c: Detain the driver for less than 15 days

question: If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person who has not obtained a driving license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of __________.

If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person whose driving license has been revoked or temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of _________.

If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person who has not obtained a driving license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also _______________.

options.a: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
options.d: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question: If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person whose driving license has been revoked or temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security department should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ___________________.

options.a: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
options.b: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question: If a motorized vehicle driver causes a traffic accident and runs away but his conduct does not constitute a crime, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____________________.

If a motorized vehicle driver causes a traffic accident and runs away but his conduct does not constitute a crime, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ________________.

options.a: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
options.d: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question: If a motorized vehicle runs _________ faster than the specified speed limit, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan.

If a motorized vehicle runs 50% faster than the specified speed limit, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ________________.

options.a: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
options.d: Ban the driver for three years from re-obtaining a driving license

question: If a motorized vehicle driver forces his way through in violation of the traffic control regulations and refuses to accept dissuasion, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ________________.

If a motor vehicle driver has deliberately destroyed, moved or altered traffic facilities and his conduct has caused serious consequences but does not constitute a crime, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ________.
If a driver drives an illegalled assembled motorized vehicle on the road, the driver is subject to a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan and _______________.

options.b: The driving license should be revoked
options.c: The vehicle license should be revoked

question: If a driver drives a motorized vehicle on the road, which has reached the write-off standard, the driver is subject to a fine of 200 yuan ~ 2,000 yuan and __________.

options.b: The vehicle license should be revoked
options.c: The driving license should be revoked
options.d: The driving license should be temporarily detained

question: If a person sells a motorized vehicle that has reached the write-off standard, his illegal proceeds should be confiscated, a fine equivalent to the proceeds from selling the vehicle should be imposed, the vehicle should be confiscated, and ___________.

options.a: The vehicle purchaser should be detained
options.b: The vehicle seller should be detained
options.c: The driving license of the vehicle purchaser should be revoked
options.d: The vehicle should be arbitrarily written off

question: If a party fails to perform the decision on administrative punishment, the administrative organ that has made the decision on administrative punishment may ______________.

options.a: Apply to the people's court for enforcement
options.b: Apply to the people's procuratorate for enforcement
options.c: Revoke the driving license of the party
options.d: Detain the party for less than 15 days

question: The person who has violated the road traffic regulations should go to the ________ within 15 days to accept punishment.

options.c: Traffic control department of the public security organ
options.d: Department in charge of road transport administration

question: If a person has violated the road traffic regulations and has failed to accept punishment without justification within a time limit, _________.

options.a: The person should be detained for 15 days
options.b: His driving license should be revoked
options.d: Be banned for lifetime from re-obtaining a driving license

question: The Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety is enacted to strengthen the administration over the motorized vehicles.
All vehicle drivers, pedestrians and passengers on the roads within the People's Republic of China must abide by the Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
All the units and individuals who are related to the road traffic activities within the People's Republic of China must abide by the Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
The pedestrians and passengers on the road should act in reference to the Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
A motorized vehicle without a license plate may run on the road.
A motorized vehicle without a label of inspection may run on the road.
A motorized vehicle without a label of insurance may run on the road.
A person who drives a motorized vehicle on the road must bring the vehicle license with the vehicle.
The license plate of a motorized vehicle should be installed according to the stipulations, should be clear and complete and should not be covered or stained.
No unit or individual is allowed to confiscate or detain the license plate of a motorized vehicle.
If a motorized vehicle has reached the write-off standard, its revocation registration must be handled in a timely manner.
Siren or marker light may be installed on a motorized vehicle according to personal need.
No unit or individual is allowed to illegally assemble a motorized vehicle.
A professional repair enterprise may change the model number, engine number and the chassis number of a motorized vehicle.
A professional repair enterprise may change the vehicle identification code.
No unit or individual is allowed to falsify or alter the registration papers, license plate, vehicle license, label of inspection and label of insurance of a motorized vehicle.
If approved by a transport enterprise, the altered registration papers, license plate, vehicle license, label of inspection and label of insurance may of a motorized vehicle may be used.
A unit or individual may temporarily use the label of inspection and the label of insurance of another motorized vehicle on the road.
A transport enterprise may internally redistribute the labels of inspection and the labels of insurance of motorized vehicles on the road.

A motorized vehicle driver may drive a motorized vehicle on the road only after he has passed the tests administered by the traffic control department of the public security organ and obtained the driving license.

If a person who has a foreign driving license for motorized vehicle and has passed the tests administered by the traffic control department of the public security organ, a Chinese driving license for motorized vehicle may be issued to him.
Nobody is allowed to drive a motorized vehicle that has safety hazards such as incomplete safety devices or technically substandard components
A person who drinks alcohol but is not drunk may drive a motorized vehicle.
Uniformed road traffic signals are used nationwide.
Driving a motorized vehicle should observe the left-hand driving principle.

If a road is divided into the lane for motorized vehicles, the lane for non-motorized vehicles and the lane for pedestrians, the motorized vehicles, the non-motorized vehicles and the pedestrians should use the lanes designed respectively for them.
If a road has a special lane, other vehicles may use the special lane for overtaking.
A small motorized vehicle may overtake a police car performing an emergency task.
Motorized vehicles are not allowed to overtake at the intersections.
When a motorized vehicle passes a curve, it may overtake rapidly if no accident will occur.
Motorized vehicles should pass the intersections according to the traffic signals.
When a road maintenance vehicle or an engineering vehicle is operating, other vehicles do not have to yield.
When a motorized vehicle temporarily stops on the road, it should not obstruct the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians.
A motorized vehicle whose designed maximum speed is less than 70km is allowed to enter the expressways.
When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the expressway, the persons on board should swiftly move to the front of the vehicle for hiding.
If a motorized vehicle breaks down or causes a traffic accident on the expressway and cannot to run normally, the vehicle should be towed by a rescue vehicle or a tow truck.
When a road accident causes human casualties and the vehicle driver needs to change the scene for rescuing the wounded, the driver should mark the location.
The punishments against the violations of the regulations on road traffic safety include warning, fine, temporary detention or revocation of the driving license, and detention.
A driver may drive on the road an illegally assembled motorized vehicle or a motorized vehicle reaching the saraped standard.

If a person who has violated the provisions of the law and regulations on road traffic safety and has caused a major traffic accident and if his act constitutes a crime, he should be held for criminal liabilities according to law and his driving license should be revoked by the traffic control department of the public security organ.

If a person has caused a traffic accident and run away, the traffic control department of the public security organ should revoke his driving license and ban him for lifetime from re-obtaining a driving license.

If a party fails to pay the fine within the time limit, the administrative organ that has made the decision on administrative punishment may impose an additional fine at the daily rate of 3% of the original fine.

The "roads" mentioned in the Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety refer to the highways, urban roads and the places that are within the jurisdiction of the units but allow the passing of social motorized vehicles.
Squares, public parking lots and other places for public passing do not belong to the "roads" mentioned in the Law of the People's Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
The registration of motorized vehicles excludes the registration of ________.

If the residence of the owner of a registered motorized vehicle moves out of the area under the jurisdiction of the traffic control department of the public security organ, the vehicle owner should apply to the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle for ___________ registration.

If the residence of the owner of a registered motorized vehicle moves into the area under the jurisdiction of the traffic control department of the public security organ, the vehicle owner should apply to the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle for __________ registration.

When applying for the transfer registration of a motorized vehicle, the certificate or document the party does not have to provide to the traffic control department of the public security organ that registers this vehicle is ______________.

options.d: The certificate and document on the transfer of the ownership of the vehicle

question: If a registered motorized vehicle reaches the state's mandatory write-off standard, the owner of the vehicle should ____________ before the expiration of the write-off period.

options.a: Sell it to the waste recycling station
options.b: Sell to the vehicle recycling enterprise
options.c: Hand it over to the traffic control department of the public security organ
options.d: Hand it over to the department in charge of road transport administration

question: If a registered motorized vehicle reaches the state's mandatory write-off standard, ______ should present the registration paper, license plate and vehicle license of the written-off vehicle to the traffic control department of the public security organ for revocation.

options.d: The safety and technical inspection institution

question: If the registration paper, license plate and vehicle license of a motorized vehicle are lost or destroyed and the vehicle owner applies for reissuing them, the owner should provide his ID card and application materials to the _______________.

options.b: The traffic control department of the public security organ
options.c: The department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question: Painting and pasting signs or advertisements on the motorized vehicles should observe the principle that _________.

options.a: The painting and pasting can be done at will
options.b: The painting and pasting are mainly for artistic consideration
options.c: The painting and pasting should not affect safe driving
options.d: The painting and pasting should be done according to customer requests

question: The small and mini non-commercial passenger vehicles should be inspected once every two years within __________ as from the date of registration.
The small and mini non-commercial passenger vehicles should be inspected once every ________ from the 6th to the 15th year as from the date of registration.
______ after a motorized vehicle driver obtains his driving license for the first time is his period of probation.
The motorized vehicle driver is not allowed to drive __________ during his period of probation.
The period of validity of a motorized vehicle driving license is respectively ____, 10 years and lifelong.
The cycle for recording the accumulated penalty points for violating road traffic safety regulations is ____________.

If the accumulated penalty points of a motorized vehicle driver reach 12 points and the driver refuses to participate in the study course notified by the traffic control department of the public security organ and also refuses to take tests, the traffic control department of the public security organ _______________.

options.a: Should publicly announce that his driving license should no longer be used
options.d: Impose a double fine on him

question: If a motorized vehicle driving license is lost or destroyed and the motorized vehicle driver applies for reissuing it, the driver should provide his ID card and application materials to the _________.

options.b: The traffic control department of the public security organ
options.c: The department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question: When there is no speed limit sign or marking, the maximum speed for motorized vehicles on an urban road without the central dividing line is ________.
When there is no speed limit sign or marking, the maximum speed for motorized vehicles on a highway without the central dividing line is ________.
When there is no speed limit sign or marking, the maximum speed for motorized vehicles on an urban road with only one lane for motorized vehicles in the same direction is ______________.
When there is no speed limit sign or marking, the maximum speed for motorized vehicles on a highway with only one lane for motorized vehicles in the same direction is ___________.
In a foggy weather with a visibility of less then 50 meters, the maximum speed for motor vehicles should be no more than ________________.
In a rainy weather with a visibility of less than 50 meters, the maximum speed for motor vehicles should be no more than ____________.
In a snowy weather with a visibility of less than 50 meters, the maximum speed for motor vehicles should be no more than ______________.
In a dusty weather with a visibility of less than 50 meters, the maximum speed for motor vehicles should be no more than _____________.
In a hailing weather with a visibility of less than 50 meters, the maximum speed for motor vehicles should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle enters the lane for non-motorized vehicles, the maximum speed should be no more than ______________.
When a motor vehicle leaves the lane for non-motorized vehicles, the maximum speed should be no more than __________.
When a motor vehicle passes a level crossing, the maximum speed should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle passes sharp curve, the maximum speed should be no more than ________________.
When a motor vehicle passes a narrow road, the maximum speed should be no more than _________.
When a motor vehicle passes a narrow bridge, the maximum speed should be no more than _______________.
When a motor vehicle goes down a slope, the maximum speed should be no more than __________.
When a motor vehicle makes a U turn, the maximum speed should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle makes a turn, the maximum speed should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle pulls a breakdown motorized vehicle, the maximum speed should be no more than _______________.
When a motorized vehicle overtakes, it ______________.

options.a: Should overtake from the right side of the vehicle in front
options.b: Should overtake from the left side of the vehicle in front
options.c: May overtake from both sides of the vehicle in front
options.d: May not obey the speed limit

question: When a following vehicle gives overtaking signals on a road without a central dividing line, the vehicle in front should _________________.

options.d: Reduce speed, move to the right side and yield if conditions permit

question: When a following vehicle gives overtaking signals on a road with only one lane for motorized vehicles in the same direction, the vehicle in front should __________.
When motorized vehicles have difficulty in crossing each other on a narrow mountain road, ____________ should go first.

options.c: The vehicle close to the mountain
options.d: The vehicle not close to the mountain

question: When motorized vehicles cross each other on a narrow bridge, they should _________.

options.b: Reduce speed and pass on the right-hand side
options.c: Refuse to yield to the other side
options.d: Reduce speed and pass in the middle

question: If there is an obstacle on one side of a road where two vehicles cross each other, ________ should go first.

options.a: The vehicle that has no obstacle in front
options.b: The vehicle that has no conditions to yield
options.c: The vehicle that has obstacle in front

question: When motorized vehicles cross each other on a narrow slope, the correct method is to allow ______________ to go first.

options.a: The vehicle going up the slope
options.b: The vehicle far from the top of the slope
options.c: The vehicle going down the slope
options.d: The vehicle going up the slope should go first, if the one going down the slope is halfway on the slope and the one to go up the slope has not begun going up the slope

question: When crossing each other at night, the vehicle should change to the low beam light at a distance of ______________ from the coming vehicle.
The place where a U turn is allowed for motorized vehicles is ____________.
A motorized vehicle that will turn right at an intersection but has a vehicle in front in the same lane waiting for the green light should ______________.

options.a: Bypass the vehicle in front from the left side and go through the intersection
options.b: Honk to indicate the vehicle in front to yield
options.c: Bypass the vehicle in front from the right side and go through the intersection
options.d: Stop and wait for his turn

question: At an intersection that has no directional traffic lights, _________________.

options.a: The motorized vehicle that will turn should yield to the vehicle that will go straight
options.b: The motorized vehicle that will go straight should yield to the vehicle that will turn
options.c: The motorized vehicle in the opposite direction that will turn left should yield to the vehicle that will turn right
options.d: The vehicles should bypass from the left or right side and go through the intersection

question: A motorized vehicle that goes through an intersection without the traffic lights should _______.

options.a: Yield to the vehicle coming from the left side of the road
options.b: Yield to the vehicle coming from the right side of the road
options.c: The vehicle that turns left should yield to the vehicle that turns right
options.d: The vehicle that goes straight should yield to the turning vehicle

question: When the motorized vehicles go through an intersection that has neither traffic lights nor traffic police to direct traffic, the vehicles coming in the opposite directions ___________.

options.a: The vehicle that goes straight should yield to the vehicle that turns left
options.b: The vehicle that turns left should yield to the vehicle that goes straight
options.c: The vehicle that turns right should yield to the vehicle that turns left
options.d: The vehicles may go through as they wish
